General.Name: Hypefactors A/S
General.Description: Hypefactors A/S operates as a software company that delivers a media intelligence tech platform. The company provides an artificial intelligence-based PR automation platform to power the PR workflow and various facts to document the results. It serves enterprises, small and medium sized companies, and PR agencies. Hypefactors A/S was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
